card.name: HDFC Bank Credit Cards
card.variant: Infinia, Regalia Gold, Regalia, Diners, Corporate, Business, payZapp, Others
card.description: HDFC Bank SmartBuy offers valuable deals and cashback on purchases made using HDFC Bank credit and debit cards. The platform facilitates payments and provides reward points and cashback benefits on select transactions.
card.target_audience: HDFC Bank customers using HDFC Bank payment instruments including credit cards, debit cards, and PayZapp.

categories.name: Select HDFC Bank Credit Cards
categories.description: Up to 3X Reward Points on select HDFC Bank Credit Cards
categories.terms_and_conditions: Offer valid on select credit cards only. Reward points are posted to active accounts only. Purchases eligible for instant discount/cashback will not qualify for reward points.
categories.how_to_earn: Use select HDFC Bank credit cards for transactions on SmartBuy.
categories.exclusions: Virtual cards, Consumer Durable, VPA, Fleet, R&R Commercial, Purchase cards, Intermiles, Paytm, Equitas, Swiggy, Flipkart Wholesale, Pine Labs, Emirates, Harley, IBIBO, IRCTC, Times, Tata Neu, Shoppers, Bestprice, 6E Rewards, Marriott, PhonePay, Snapdeal Cards.

categories.name: Other HDFC Bank Debit and Credit Cards & PayZapp
categories.description: 1% Cashback on other HDFC Bank Debit, Credit Cards & PayZapp offer
categories.terms_and_conditions: Applicable on transactions via SmartBuy platform only.
categories.how_to_earn: Use other HDFC Bank debit or credit cards or PayZapp for transactions.

bonus_rates.condition: Using EASYEMI on HDFC Bank Credit Cards
bonus_rates.terms_and_conditions: Up to 26% cashback with EASYEMI on select products including Televisions, Air Conditioners, Refrigerators, Washing Machines, Microwave Ovens, Dishwashers, Air Purifiers & Water Purifiers. Maximum cashback Rs. 50,000. Velocity: 1 transaction per card per month. Applicable tenures: 6, 8, 9, 10, 12 & 18 months at low cost.

bonus_rates.condition: Full Swipe Credit Card Transactions on select products
bonus_rates.terms_and_conditions: Offer applicable on select products on Credit Card Full Swipe transactions.

redemption.process: Reward points are posted to active accounts and can be redeemed as per HDFC Bank's reward program policies.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Reward points will not be posted on permanently delinquent or closed accounts or retail credit card accounts flagged for working capital usage.
redemption.validity: Subject to account status at time of posting
redemption.processing_time: Within 120 days of cashback posting month or end of offer month for instant discount offers.

benefits.name: Up to Rs. 50,000 Cashback at LG
benefits.description: Up to 26% cashback at LG with EASYEMI on HDFC Bank Credit Cards on select products.
benefits.how_to_avail: Purchase at LG Brand Shop, Authorized Dealer, Leading Retailer or online at www.lg.com/in using EASYEMI on HDFC Bank Credit Card.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Offer valid from 2nd August 2025 to 31st August 2025. Velocity: 1 transaction per card per month. Preclosure interest charges and fees apply on EMI preclosure. Offer cannot be combined with other offers. Cashback and discounts are instant and upfront.
benefits.eligibility: Select HDFC Bank Credit Cardholders only

current_offers.title: Up to 10X Reward Points / 10% Cashback with HDFC Bank Cards & EasyEMI
current_offers.description: Earn up to 10X reward points or 10% cashback on purchases made using HDFC Bank cards and EasyEMI.
current_offers.terms_and_conditions: Applicable on select merchants and categories. Subject to terms and conditions of HDFC Bank SmartBuy.
current_offers.how_to_activate: Use eligible HDFC Bank cards for transactions on SmartBuy platform.
current_offers.exclusions: Non-HDFC Bank payment instruments not eligible.

perks.name: EasyEMI
perks.description: Avail low-cost EMI options on select products with HDFC Bank Credit Cards.
perks.how_to_use: Choose EASYEMI option at checkout on eligible products.
perks.terms_and_conditions: Preclosure interest charges and 3% preclosure fee apply. Benefits like payback or instant discount offered by merchant will be debited within 120 days of EMI closure.
perks.validity: Offer valid from 2nd August 2025 to 31st August 2025

partnerships.benefit: Up to 26% Cashback with EASYEMI on HDFC Bank Credit Cards
partnerships.how_to_avail: Purchase at LG Brand Shop, Authorized Dealer, Leading Retailer or online at www.lg.com/in using EASYEMI on HDFC Bank Credit Card.
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Maximum cashback Rs. 50,000. Velocity: 1 transaction per card per month. Preclosure interest charges and fees apply on EMI preclosure. Offer cannot be combined with other offers.

fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Preclosure interest charges plus 3% preclosure fee on principal outstanding apply on preclosure of EMI transactions.
